problem_text_cn: ⊙O是半径为1的圆,点O到直线L的距离为3,过直线L上的任一点P作⊙O的切线,切点为Q；若以PQ为边作正方形PQRS,则正方形PQRS的面积最小为()
problem_text_en: ⊙O is a circle with a radius of N_0, the distance from point O to line L is N_1, draw a tangent of ⊙O through any point P on the straight line L , and the tangent point is Q; if PQ is taken as the edge to make the square PQRS, then the minimum area of the square PQRS is ()
